core:description.text: An iconic V-shaped glass holds the quintessential cocktail, perfectly clear with a slight sheen of oil from quality gin. A single olive rests at the bottom like a treasure, and the aroma of juniper and dry vermouth speaks of sophisticated evenings.

containers-core:liquid_container.flavorText: Crystal-clear and bone-dry, the martini delivers a crisp, botanical punch. Juniper and citrus give way to the subtle herbaceousness of vermouth. The olive adds a briny counterpoint that makes each sip more compelling than the last.
